# Steps to reproduce

Right-click on empty space in the Windows Explorer

# Expected behavior

The "PowerShell 7" option appears in the context menu

# Actual behavior

It only appears when selecting a file

# Environment data

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

Windows 10 Home Version 2004 (OS Build 19041.264)
title: [Windows] PowerShell 7 doesn't appear in background context menu for folders.
